title.normal: NotedBot, a Twitch chatbot like any other... or maybe not?
title.1: Ready to boost your chat into hyperdrive? 🚀
title.2: A bot that does more than just !ping – guaranteed ⚙️
title.3: Not your standard bot – NotedBot brings the extra power ⚡
title.4: More than just a bot – your all-rounder 🎯
title.5: Like a protocol droid, but way cooler 🤖

features.notis:
Notis is NotedBot's internal currency.
Earn Notis through various activities and climb to the top of the leaderboard! More about Notis Commands
features.management:
Commands can be used with the prefix !.
Use the !prefix command to change the prefix per channel.
features.technic: NotedBot is built on modern TypeScript code, designed specifically for IRC and EventSub. All data is stored in a SQL database.
features.openSource: NotedBot offers many of its bot functions through a public API – available at APIs.
features.lang: NotedBot supports both German and English for channels and users ➜ !channel lang or !lang

message.ohne_flex: I have a good feeling about this
message.notedbot: Thanks for adding me, you can see my commands here

start.title: Add NotedBot:
start.text:
Add NotedBot to your Twitch channel by clicking 'Add Bot' below.

NotedBot offers awesome features like 🔧 Custom Commands, 💬 Chat Interactions, and full 7TV integration.

If you have any questions, found a bug or need help, contact me directly on Twitch

blog.performance: NotedBot used to send many requests. By implementing multiple Promises and a caching system, message handling is now significantly more efficient.
blog.websocket: NotedBot now has a WebSocket connection to Twitch, bringing new commands like !livemsg and !liveping. Check them out here: Command Link.
blog.page: You can now log in on the website with your Twitch account and have the bot join your channel.
blog.global: Use the command !globalannounce to get global news straight in your chat – like new Twitch badges, emotes, or fresh 7TV badges & paints. See it here: Command Link.
blog.7tv: New 7TV commands to upgrade your chat style! Find all commands here.

title.1: The secret tools for your daily chat grind 🧰
title.2: Your command arsenal – locked and loaded 🚀
title.3: From !ping to !notis – everything I can do is right here 🍷
title.4: Level up your chat with the best NotedBot commands ✨
title.5: True power lies in your commands 🔮
